section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Functions for micrograph processing.

section.title: field_add()

para.para: Adds a field-of-view parameter structure to a linked list.

entry.para: pointer to any field-of-view in the list.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bfield* new field-of-view. The function allocates memory for a new field-of-view structure. If the content of the pointer is null, the new structure is the first in the list. Otherwise, the end of the list is found and the new structure added to it.

para.para: Calculates the length of a filament.

section.para: Definition at line 1135 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.title: micrograph_update()

para.computeroutput: int micrograph_update (Bmicrograph * mg, Bmicrograph * nu_mg, int fom_index, int flags)

para.para: Updates an existing micrograph with new information.

entry.para: index of FOM to select on.
flags indicating which parts to update.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para:
int 0. The new information is encoded as a micrograph structure. All fields are updated if the new fields contain non-default data. Defaults are defined here as zero-length strings or zeroes. The particles in the original micrograph are matched by ID with those in the new micrograph and updated, with any new particles added from the new micrograph. The bad area and marker coordinates are replaced if they exist in the new structure. The new micrograph structure is not modified, except for deletion of bad areas and markers.
Flags: 1 particles 2 bad areas 4 filaments 8 structure factors 16 layer lines 32 markers

section.title: project_add_origins_to_coords()

para.para: Adds the particle origins to the micrograph coordinates.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The coordinates of particles from a micrograph and particle origins in an image processing parameter structure are added. The old micrograph coordinates are overwritten with the results. Requirement: The box radius for picked particles must be specified.

section.title: project_flip_origins()

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The particle origins are reversed. The specification of axes to flip is embedded in the flip number: first bit - x second bit - y third bit - z

section.title: project_set_field_id()

para.para: Sets the field id's according to a regular series.

section.para: Definition at line 1471 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.title: project_update()

para.computeroutput: int project_update (Bproject * project, Bproject * proj_new, int fom_index)

para.para: Updates an existing project with new information.

entry.para: project parameter structure to be updated.
project parameter structure with new information.
index of FOM to select on.

literallayout.computeroutput: The new information is encoded as a project hierarchy. The original project hierarchy is searched for the micrograph ID tags that correspond to the original project hierarchy and those micrograph parameters are updated. Because the micrograph ID tags should be unique in themselves, the field ID tags are ignored and the two project hierarchies may have different field designations. If a micrograph ID from the new project hierarchy is not found in the original project hierarchy, it is added. The new project hierarchy is not modified.

section.para: Definition at line 773 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.title: reconstruction_add()

para.para: Adds a reconstruction parameter structure to a linked list.

entry.para: pointer to any reconstruction in the list.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Breconstruction* new reconstruction. The function allocates memory for a new micrograph structure. If the content of the pointer is null, the new structure is the first in the list. Otherwise, the end of the list is found and the new structure added to it.

literallayout.computeroutput: Frees all the structures down the hierarchy.

section.title: reconstruction_set_part_links()

para.para: Sets the links from particles back to the reconstruction.

section.para: Definition at line 1150 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.title: reconstruction_update()

para.computeroutput: int reconstruction_update (Breconstruction * rec, Breconstruction * nu_rec, int fom_index, int flags)

para.para: Updates an existing reconstruction with new information.

entry.para: index of FOM to select on.
flags indicating which parts to update.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The new information is encoded as a reconstruction structure. The update is only done if the FOM of the new reconstruction is better. All fields are updated if the new fields contain non-default data. Defaults are defined here as zero-length strings or zeroes. The particles in the original reconstruction are matched by ID with those in the new reconstruction and updated, with any new particles added from the new reconstruction. The bad area and marker coordinates are replaced if they exist in the new structure. The new reconstruction structure is not modified, except for deletion of bad areas and markers.

section.para: Definition at line 947 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.para: Definition at line 652 of file mg_processing.cpp.

section.title: views_from_project()

para.para: Retrieves the particle views from a project.

entry.para: selection number (-1 selects positives, 0 selects all).
